long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Gryph for Chrome is a free download providing sales reps an easy access point to the Gryphon ONE Platform (with an active license).

Conveniently leverage benefits of the Gryphon ONE Platform through the Gryphon ONE Extension. This browser extension/add-on provides a simple access point to sales reps who already leverage the benefits of the Gryphon ONE Platform.  

Gryph for Chrome is easy to deploy and configure within minutes. Once the unpacked extension is loaded you will use our easy to follow 4-step process and be up and running. Simply pin the Gryphon icon as a new Chrome widget making it even easier to access.

Companies using the Gryphon ONE Platform along with an industry-specific, custom, in-house CRM, or no CRM at all will benefit from the Gryphon ONE Extension. 

If you have questions about the Gryphon ONE Platform or your user license see www.gryphon.ai. You will need an active license for the Gryphon ONE Platform to access it through the Gryphon ONE Extension.
